references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces score-based generative modeling, a fundamental technique used in the target paper's 3D-aware image compositing framework.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion models, which is a core component of the target paper's image generation pipeline.
This paper presents AnyDoor, a method for object-level image customization that the target paper's method builds upon and improves.
This paper introduces visual instruction tuning, a technique used to enhance the multimodal capabilities of large language models, which the target paper leverages to improve its model's performance.

references.paper_title: Llama: Open and efficient foundation language models
references.reason: This paper introduces Llama, a foundational large language model used by the target paper's fine-tuned multi-modal large language model.
